feature.label: UML Profile for SysML (Feature)
feature.description: UML Profile for Systems Modeling Language (SysML). SysML supports the specification, analysis, design, and verification and validation of a broad range of complex systems. These systems may include hardware, software, information, processes, personnel, and facilities. http://www.sysml.org/specs.htm
